response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price tailored to reflect its true worth and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,150,000. This offer not only ensures that you secure this valuable asset at a premium but also allows me to maximize the return on this unique item. I look forward to discussing the details further and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1150000}
